com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.db.step

Class GeneratedDbStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.extension.indatabase.db.step.GeneratedDbStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbStep, java.io.Serializable

    public class GeneratedDbStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements DbStep
    For efficiency, this class generates the column list and the SQL code for a DbStep for a DatabaseProvider. This way, it avoids re-running the entire stack every time the column list or SQL is required, like a cache.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getColumnRefs

        public java.util.List<Column> getColumnRefs(DatabaseProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: DbStep
        Builds the column reference list: a DbStep can build its column list from a source DbStep this way. Using the column list directly via DbStep.getColumns(DatabaseProvider) would result in repeating column expressions or schema specification leading to syntax error.
        Specified by:
        getColumnRefs in interface DbStep
        Returns:

      • toSql

        Specified by:
